American Community Survey population data

acs.Rd

These data sets contain population data for Kansas City, Missouri, sourced from the US Census Bureau's American Community Survey (ACS). In 1-year ACS data sets, the summary level is Kansas City only. In 5-year ACS data sets, available summary levels include city, census tract, and ZIP code tabulation area (ZCTA).

Data sets were downloaded from data.census.gov using the tidycensus package. All data variables from the full and collapsed Age and Sex, Race, and Hispanic Origin tables are included (i.e., tables beginning with B01, B02, B03, C01, C02, and C03).

See Guidance for Data Users for information on how to use ACS data.

Format

GEOID

  • Geographic identifier

  • Data type: character

NAME

  • Geographic area name

  • Data type: character

variable

  • Variable code (ACS table and variable codes separated by an underscore)

  • Data type: character

estimate

  • Estimated population count

  • Data type: double

moe

  • Margin of error

  • Data type: double

label

  • Descriptive variable label

  • Data type: character

concept

  • ACS table name

  • Data type: character

geography

  • Smallest geography for which a variable is summarized

  • Data type: character

  • 5-year ACS tables only
